H0.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Magmatic

H1.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Volcanic

H2.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Magmaic

H3.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Igneous

A4.text: Igneous rocks are formed through the cooling and solidification of magma or lava.

A5.text: Extrusive igneous rock, also known as volcanic rock, is formed by the cooling of molten magma on the earth's surface.
